TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataSource

summary.span: 表示資料繫結控制項繫結的抽象資料來源。

span.span: Represents an abstract data source that data-bound controls bind to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支援控制項的資料繫結架構，可讓 Web 伺服器控制項繫結至資料一致的方式。ASP.NET supports a control data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. 資料繫結控制項，以及協助繫結稱為資料來源控制項的類別會參照 web 伺服器控制項的繫結至資料。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 資料來源控制項可以表示任何資料來源： 關聯式資料庫、 檔案、 資料流、 商務物件等等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on. 資料繫結控制項，不論來源或基礎資料的格式一致的方式中的資料來源控制項呈現資料。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 您實作當您想要實作您自己自訂的 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項的介面。You implement the interface when you want to implement your own custom ASP.NET data source control. 任何實作類別介面是資料來源控制項。Any class that implements the interface is a data source control. 介面會作為所有 ASP.NET 資料來源的基礎控制，並使用其兩個方法會定義一個基本的資料繫結架構概念：方法和方法。The interface serves as the foundation for all ASP.NET data source controls and defines one of the fundamental data-binding architecture concepts with its two methods: the method and the method. 這個概念是所有的資料來源控制項支援其資料的一或多個具名的檢視。This concept is that all data source controls support one or more named views on their data. 資料來源檢視物件是類似於抽象命名空間： 資料可繫結，自訂檢視之資料的排序、 篩選和其他檢視定義的資料作業。The data source view object is similar to the abstraction in the namespace: a data-bindable, customized view of data for sorting, filtering, and other data operations that the view defines. 基本上，資料來源控制項不做任何動作只擷取資料的檢視。At its core, a data source control does nothing more than retrieve views on data. 資料來源控制項可以有一或多個相關聯的資料來源檢視物件。A data source control can have one or more associated data source view objects. 某些資料來源控制項，包括代表關聯式資料庫，例如和，只支援一個檢視。Some data source controls, including those that represent relational databases such as and , support only one view. 其他資料來源控制項，包括階層式資料來源控制項，例如，支援許多檢視。Other data source controls, including hierarchical data source controls such as , support many views. 資料來源檢視定義資料來源和它所支援的作業的功能。The data source view defines the capabilities of a data source and the operations that it supports. 在 [摘要] 資料來源控制項實作介面、 支援一個或多個具名的資料表示，便一律支援從它們代表的資料來源擷取資料的檢視。In summary, data source controls implement the interface, support one or more named views on the data they represent, and always support data retrieval from the data source they represent. 資料來源控制項永遠根據需要擷取資料，例如當`DataBind`資料繫結控制項上呼叫。Data source controls always retrieve data on demand, such as when `DataBind` is called on a data bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何實作類別所定義之方法介面，以提供資料繫結控制項的資料。The following code example demonstrates how a class can implement the methods defined by the interface to provide data to data-bound controls. 在此範例中的資料來源控制項做為資料來源上的逗點分隔值檔案，並可供任何資料繫結控制項以顯示以逗號分隔的檔案資料。The data source control in this example acts as a data source on a comma-separated value file, and can be used by any data-bound control to display comma-separated file data. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#1)]

summary.span: 當資料來源控制項變更而影響資料繫結控制項時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a data source control has changed in some way that affects data-bound controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件會影響資料繫結控制項和其資料之間的資料繫結的一些方法來資料繫結控制項或基礎資料的屬性變更時。The event is raised when the properties of a data-bound control or the underlying data has changed in some way that affects the data bindings between a data-bound control and its data. 如果檔案名稱屬性，例如，例如引發事件上以檔案為基礎的資料來源控制項屬性，變更。For example, the event is raised if a file name property, such as the property, is changed on a file-based data source control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.DataSourceView GetView(string viewName) cil managed
Public Function GetView (viewName As String) As DataSourceView

span.span: The name of the view to retrieve.

summary.span: 取得與資料來源控制項關聯的具名資料來源檢視。

span.span: Gets the named data source view associated with the data source control.

returns.span: 傳回與 關聯的具名 。

span.span: Returns the named associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料來源控制項類別可支援其基礎資料的一個或多個檢視。Data source control classes can support one or more views on their underlying data. 執行個體，代表這些檢視類別。These views are represented by instances of the class. 資料來源檢視定義資料來源控制項的功能，並執行所有需要從基礎資料存放區擷取資料並執行作業，例如排序、 插入、 刪除和更新的工作。The data source view defines the capabilities of a data source control, and performs all the work necessary to retrieve data from the underlying data store and perform operations such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating. 資料來源控制項類別可實作介面實作方法以傳回強型別檢視與類別相關聯的物件。Data source control classes that implement the interface implement the method to return strongly typed view objects associated with the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作資料來源控制項類別介面會實作方法，傳回強型別執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates how a data source control class that implements the interface implements the method, returning a strongly typed instance of the class. 資料來源控制項只支援一個檢視，因為它會忽略名稱，並傳回名為使用預設的檢視名稱的檢視。Because the data source control supports only one view, it ignores the name and returns a view named with the default view name. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ICollection GetViewNames() cil managed

summary.span: 取得名稱集合，表示與 介面關聯的檢視物件清單。

span.span: Gets a collection of names representing the list of view objects associated with the interface.

returns.span: ，包含與 關聯的檢視名稱。

span.span: An that contains the names of the views associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料來源控制項類別可支援其基礎資料的一或多個具名的檢視。Data source control classes can support one or more named views on their underlying data. 方法會傳回目前資料來源控制項的執行個體相關聯的檢視名稱的集合。The method returns a collection of view names currently associated with the data source control instance. 呼叫端可以逐一查看集合中的檢視名稱，並擷取個別物件與方法。Callers can iterate through the collection of view names and retrieve individual objects with the method. 資料來源控制項類別可實作介面實作方法以傳回名稱的集合，代表所有資料來源檢視目前資料來源控制項類別相關聯的物件。Data source control classes that implement the interface implement the method to return a collection of names that represents all the data source view objects currently associated with the data source control class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作資料來源控制項介面會實作方法，傳回之名稱的集合。The following code example demonstrates how a data source control that implements the interface implements the method, returning an collection of names. 因為資料來源支援只有一個檢視，方法會傳回一個項目，使用檢視的預設名稱的集合。Because the data source supports only one view, the method returns a collection of one element using the default name for the view. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#4)]
